title: The One About Public Transportation
description:
This week Bob and Monét talk public transportation. The two reflect on their time in NYC and how other cities transit compares. Monét sings praises of Citibike, Bob compares their Uber ratings, and they both argue which subway lines are superior.
See Monét and Bob on tour this summer by going to bobandmonet.com !!
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
